abstract: Holland Cotter reviews group show of mixed-media works by artists from Istanbul and New Orleans at C24 Gallery.
snippet: “Double Crescent: Art From Istanbul and New Orleans” at c24 features young artists from both these cities.
lead_paragraph: “Double Crescent: Art From Istanbul and New Orleans” at c24 features young artists from both these cities.
